Articles.Content:
Hello! Today, Nik Wallenda, from the family famous for their high-rope stunts, have reached another milestone.

Nik was not only the first in his high-flying family to cross the Niagara Falls, but also the closest-ever person to the mist and winds of Horseshoe Falls, and the fastest-ever crossing on highrope. He made the trip from USA to Canada, and, of course, was greeted by Canadian Officials after the 23-minute journey. Here is a conversation between them:

Officer: Welcome to Canada!

Nik: Hi!

Officer: Do you have your passport?

Nik: Oh no... *looks over Falls to New York*

Of course, Nik did pack his passport. Discuss the amazing action in this thread.

A link would be beneficial.

No recordings yet, but this should help.
